cn.title: 以太坊“伊斯坦布尔”升级已完成，相关功能已恢复

message.data: 以太坊“伊斯坦布尔”升级已完成。主网运行稳定，比特派相关功能已恢复。

en.title: Ethereum "Istanbul" upgrade has been completed and related functions have been restored

message.data: Ethereum "Istanbul" upgrade has been completed. The main network is stable, and Bitpie related functions have been restored.
